name: MashBox
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK game Jam 2021

Using your Mashomatic Mark IV, mix and mash pieces of the world together to create a mashterpiece of your very own. Put your creation on the center stage and comment a picture of what you made!

controls:

  • A and D or arrow keys to move
  • Left click on a joint node to pick up part of an object. a joint node is red if connected, and green otherwise.
  • Left click on an anchor node to pick up an entire object. An anchor node is blue.
  • Scroll while holding an object to rotate it!

Programming, art, and sound effects were done by Jackson Theel, the music and logo was done by the wonderful Liz!
